column5: Hi,  I'm having trouble viewing the site.  When i select a topic it opens fine but when i scroll to the bottom i have to click something to open a post about the topic.  Anyone else have a problem?
At the top of the post you're reading, click on "options" then go to "display mode". You're probably in Outline mode.

This happened to me a couple days ago.  I'd used Google to look up something here instead of the site's built in search, and after clicking through from Google, suddenly all threads were displaying in outline mode.  I clicked to set it back to normal mode, and it's been behaving itself ever since.
Hi,  I was using google search too for OFC.  I guess that explains it
